content.heroIntro: Welcome to VILLAS ORQUIDEA, a prestigious new development by THE PALM GROUP SPAIN located in the heart of Algorfa, Torrevieja. This exclusive collection of modern penthouses represents the pinnacle of contemporary coastal living on the Costa Blanca, combining elegant design with practical functionality. Each 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom penthouse spans 62 square meters of beautifully appointed living space, with prices starting from just €538,000—representing outstanding value in one of Spain's most desirable property markets. Scheduled for delivery on October 1st, 2025, VILLAS ORQUIDEA offers discerning buyers the perfect opportunity to invest in a thriving expat destination where English is widely spoken and international amenities are abundant. THE PALM GROUP SPAIN brings decades of expertise to this project, ensuring superior construction standards and meticulous attention to detail throughout the development.

locationSection.intro: Algorfa, nestled in the vibrant municipality of Torrevieja, is one of the Costa Blanca's most sought-after residential areas. This thriving community has become synonymous with international lifestyle, boasting the largest expat population in Spain where English is spoken everywhere. The area perfectly balances modern convenience with Mediterranean charm, offering residents direct access to world-class beaches, championship golf courses, and comprehensive healthcare facilities. Torrevieja itself has transformed into a cosmopolitan destination with a rich cultural scene, excellent dining options, and year-round sunshine. The strategic location places you just minutes from pristine sandy beaches while maintaining proximity to essential services, shopping centers, and leisure amenities. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, investment property, or holiday retreat, Algorfa's established infrastructure and friendly international community make it an exceptional choice for buyers from across Europe.

faqs.answer: Absolutely. Torrevieja boasts the largest expat community in Spain where English is widely spoken everywhere. Property values show consistent 8% year-on-year growth. La Mata's 6 kilometers of golden sand beach is also easily accessible. The development's proximity to beaches makes it perfect for water enthusiasts.

faqs.question: What amenities are near VILLAS ORQUIDEA?

faqs.question: Is Torrevieja good for expats?
faqs.answer: Yes, Torrevieja is Spain's premier destination for expatriates, offering the largest international community in the country with English widely spoken everywhere. The established expat infrastructure includes international schools, English-speaking healthcare providers, British supermarkets like Iceland, and numerous social communities welcoming newcomers.

faqs.question: What is Torrevieja known for?
faqs.answer: Torrevieja is renowned as the Costa Blanca's premier expat destination, beautiful Mediterranean beaches with Blue Flag awards, world-class championship golf courses, excellent healthcare facilities, and its vibrant cultural scene. The city is also famous for being one of Spain's safest and most welcoming communities for international residents.

faqs.question: Is Torrevieja safe to live in?
faqs.answer: Torrevieja maintains an excellent safety record and is considered one of Spain's safest communities. The area benefits from strong police presence, well-maintained infrastructure, and an engaged community focused on maintaining quality of life. Residents consistently report feeling secure in their neighborhoods.
